p: Huang et al. [ 5] draw attention to the prospects of combination therapy as a new trend in the treatment of oral cancer (a type of head and neck cancer). The authors demonstrated for the first time that crude extract of liquid oil from Juniperus indica (a plant species famous in the traditional medicine of Taiwan) exhibited anticancer capacity. It synergizes with cisplatin to treat oral cancer. The authors present the results of in vitro comparative cytotoxicity studies on a human oral cancer cell lines and animal endothelial non-cancer cell line.
